query.title: Graphic Designer
query.body:
## The Role:

Girardot is an established creative agency based in London (Victoria). We specialise in advertising and design in both print and digital. We are looking for a talented graphic designer to join our team. You should be passionate about design and ideas, well organised, flexible and highly motivated. You will be able to work independently whilst also being a great team player.

## Desired Experience:

* BA (Hons) in Graphic Design (or equivalent)
* A strong knowledge of CS Suite, Adobe Photoshop, InDesign and Illustrator, Muse is beneficial but not essential
* Preparing artwork for publication and print
* Experience with digital online advertising
* UI/UX Web Design from conception to development
* A working knowledge of HTML5, CSS 3, JS and a familiarity of CMS (WordPress) is beneficial
* Strong typographic, design and layout skills
* Knowledge of Video editing and Motion Graphics will be a bonus

## About You:

* An impressive print and digital portfolio.
* 2-3 years’ experience within a similar agency/background.
* Pro-active, confident and self-motivated individual.
* Eager to be involved in projects from concept to final artwork

## Benefits:

* Competitive Salary
* Great location in Victoria
* Health Care Insurance
* Team Socials
* Jolly Trolly – Free Beer Friday’s

query.title: Internship
query.body:
We are looking for an ambitious intern to help with social media projects and provide account management support.

We are a creative advertising and design agency based within VCCP, a large advertising agency in Victoria.

## The position:

* You will work closely with our head of digital who is also account director on some of our accounts.
* You will support her on both social media and account management across a variety of clients.
* You will learn quickly and expand your knowledge and skills in advertising and design.

## About you:

* You will have a university degree and an interest in advertising
* A highly ambitious individual and a self starter
* Able to work in a fast moving environment
* Keep projects on course and on time
* Excellent planning and organisational skills
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills
* You will be detail-oriented, disciplined and with attention to detail

## Why work with us?

* You will gain advertising skills quickly working in a fast paced, small agency
  Learn from a talented team.
* …Happy hour(s) on Friday!...

query.title: Alberto Iniesta
query.body:
Alberto is a highly creative and multi talented graphic designer working across print, digital and web.  He is a valuable and experienced addition to the Girardot team.

He has held senior positions at design and animation companies both here in the UK and in Spain, his native country.

query.title: Alex Glover
query.body:
Alex has been an active communications consultant to a wide range of global blue chip companies in the corporate and financial services sector over the last 30 years, he has gained a deep understanding of broad communications challenges that organisations face in local and international markets.

Much of his career has been centred on developing programmes for the refreshment or introduction of brands and products for organisations such as Standard Chartered Bank, PIMCO and a wide range of European based Asset Managers.

query.title: John Patterson
query.body:
John started his career as a copywriter at Leo Burnetts and then moved to Grey Advertising before becoming Joint Creative Director at BDG. He then moved to Spain  as a creative director in one of Barcelona's most creative agencies and is fluent in Spanish.

He then returned to the UK and first worked with Paul Girardot at the Lowe Howard Spink Group and over the years they have produced many campaigns together both financial and consumer.

query.title: Lexa Palfrey
query.body:
Lexa is a valuable asset having held positions on both the agency and client sides. She started her career at Iveagh Asset Management before moving to the advertising group AML.  Most recently she was Client Relationship Manager at Legg Mason.

Lexa is an account director and is also in-charge of new business at Girardot.

query.title: Paul Girardot
query.body:
Paul Girardot started his career as an Art Director at J Walter Thompson, where he spent six years working across the agencies accounts.

He then moved to other well known Advertising agencies such as Doyle Dane Bernbach and the Lowe Howard-Spink group before setting up his own agency in October 1991. The agency, Girardot, has worked for many famous financial brands and continues to grow.

query.title: Gunna Drinks - Product Campaign
query.body:
## The Task

To launch GUNNA drinks as a craft soft drink with true character, promoting the authenticity of the ingredients and the real flavor profile to millennials.

## The Solution

We created three campaigns; trade, product and brand.  All three campaigns are funning across social media channels.

**The Result**

The campaign is raising awareness of the brand and considerable interest in the trade sector who are seeing craft soft drinks and the new “craft beer” opportunity.

<iframe width="640" height="564" src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/311418143" frameborder="0" allowFullScreen mozallowfullscreen webkitAllowFullScreen></iframe>

query.title: Inchbald School of Design - Interior
query.body:
**The Task**

To generate enquiries about Inchbald School of Design’s full time, part time and online interior design and garden design courses. Also communicate their long history and credibility in the sector, 55 years creating careers.

**The Solution**

Over the past 10 years we have created a range of advertising campaigns for Inchbald, all have focused on the established track record of the school and the quality of interior and garden design students it delivers.

**The Results**

The school’s graduate courses have been full year on year and their part time and online course numbers continue to grow as we develop new and interesting ways of reaching their target audiences regionally and internationally.

![](/static/uploads/inch_ladder_a4.jpg "Inchblad Ladder - A4 Ad ")

<iframe width="640" height="564" src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/271846593" frameborder="0" allowFullScreen mozallowfullscreen webkitAllowFullScreen></iframe>

query.title: Neptune Emerging Markets
query.body:
## The task

Create a distinctive advertising campaign for the Neptune Emerging Markets Fund and the Neptune Global Alpha Fund to raise awareness and generate inflows.

The solution

We created an online campaign for the Neptune Emerging Markets Fund and both print and online advertising for the Neptune Global Alpha Fund which have distinctive look and feel to create cut-through.

The results

The Neptune Global Emerging Markets Fund campaign has achieved higher than average CTRs.

query.title: Netwealth
query.body:
## The Task

Netwealth asked us to create digital treatments of their print advertisements and a video for their Netwealth Network service.

**The Solution**

Taking their corporate styling we came up with concepts which brought to life the headlines in their advertisements and the proposition of their Netwealth Network

**The Results**

The advertising achieved well above average CTRs and the video has been commented on very positively internally and externally.

<iframe width="640" height="564" src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/271504951" frameborder="0" allowFullScreen mozallowfullscreen webkitAllowFullScreen></iframe>

query.title: Allianz Global Investors - Floating Rate
query.body:
**The Task**

Create an online advertising campaign for Allianz Global Investors to raise awareness and increase inflows into the funds.

**The Solution**

Working within the Allianz brand guidelines we created animated ads to promote the benefits of two funds in their product range.

**The Results**

The advertising has raised awareness of the funds across the Nordic and Benelux regions, generating strong CTRs.

query.title: AXA Investment Managers
query.body:
The Task

AXA asked us to create a distinctive look and feel that communicated quality, expertise and longevity. They wanted visual stand out and it had to work within the corporate guidelines created in Paris.

The Solution

We developed a ‘letterpress style’ that conveyed the feeling of established craftsmanship, and at the same time was distinctive. It had the legs to work across all marketing materials in both print & digital.

The Results

The campaign was striking and memorable; the sales team got good feedback and the CTR the online campaign achieved suggests it is created quite an impact, not to mention inflows into the funds.

![](/static/uploads/axa_short_duration_fullpg_sept14_v4-1.png)

![](/static/uploads/axa_globe.png)

![](/static/uploads/axa_master_uk_disp_fund_fullpg_july14.png)

query.title: HSBC Global Asset Management
query.body:
## The Task

HSBC asked us to create an arresting campaign that showed the strong track records of their passive investments, and their expertise and longevity in this area. They introduced their first tracker fund in 1988.

## The Solution

We created a campaign using ‘slot racing’ imagery styled in the HSBC colours. The analogy links the values in F1 with investment - dynamic, innovative, leading edge, fast moving and focused.

## The Results

The online campaign delivered well above average click through rates and inflows into the funds increased. It also raised awareness of HSBC's leading position as a provider of passive investments..

<iframe width="640" height="564" src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/325662373" frameborder="0" allowFullScreen mozallowfullscreen webkitAllowFullScreen></iframe>

![](/static/uploads/hsbc_etfs_master_singlepg_sep14.png "HSBC ETFs")

![](/static/uploads/hsbc_etfs_master_flpg_sep14.png "HSBC On Track")

query.title: Pictet
query.body:
## The Task

Pictet Asset Management asked us to create an advertising campaign using their new branding to promote their Multi-Asset Portfolio Fund.

## The Solution

We developed a campaign which used 'Simple Objects' to convey Pictet's simple and effective approach to Multi-Asset investing.

## The Results

The 'Simple Objects' campaign has just gone live and we anticipate a higher than average CTR based on the initial figures we have received.

<Player url="https://player.vimeo.com/video/172586893" />

query.title: Premier-Diversified Fund
query.body: Premier-Diversified Fund.

query.title: Theo Fennell
query.body:
![](/static/uploads/theo-weft.jpg)

![](/static/uploads/theo-lief.jpg)

![](/static/uploads/theo-twain.jpg)

## The Task

We were asked to create a corporate campaign that raised the profile of the Theo Fennell brand because it was listing on the London Stock Exchange.

## The Solution

We created a fashion campaign for maximum impact. Each ad featured a different collection from Theo’s range to demonstrate the breadth of his designs.

## The Results

The campaign raised awareness, created favourable press coverage in relevant financial publications and increased sales of the jewellery featured in the ads.

query.title: Woodham and Moortimer
query.body:
## The task

J.D. Classics has been in business for 30 years and wanted to re-brand to give a more sophisticated and professional image.  They also wanted an advertising campaign to launch the brand as Woodham Mortimer.

## The solution

We re-named the brand after a village in the local area, so the name had relevance.  We then created a simple but smart logo combined with a descriptor of their services.  The advertising campaign promoted their offering with highly sophisticated photography to give real stand out.

## The results

The look and feel of the logo and advertising has transformed the brand which is now seen as one of the most professional and sophisticated in the sector

query.title: Peter Reed
query.body:
The Task

We were asked to raise awareness of Peter Reed and their reputation as makers of high quality linen products.

The Solution

We used photography of upmarket images combined with provocative headlines to deliver a stylish 'smile' and grab attention.

The Results

The campaign was well received both internally and externally but unfortunately no concrete sales figures were available.

![](/static/uploads/peter-reed-print.png)

![](/static/uploads/peter-reed-3.png)

![](/static/uploads/peter-reed-print-2.png)

query.title: Stephen Watchorn
query.body:
"We’ve worked with Girardot for two and a half years and have been impressed with them as an agency. From presenting an initial creative concept through to delivering integrated campaigns across a range of products, the team has always delivered effective, innovative results to help us meet our sales and marketing objectives."

"Account handling has always run smoothly and they are a likeable, engaging bunch of people to work with. I’d have no hesitation in recommending them to other potential clients."

query.title: Giles Kidd May
query.body:
“I first worked with Girardot when they helped launch the Jupiter brand in 1996. Together we took"

"Jupiter’s retail funds under management from £200 million to over £5 billion."

"Girardot’s track record for developing simple and effective creative ideas made them a natural choice when it came to us selecting an agency to help us launch CRUX Asset Management."

"We are delighted with the campaign they have created for us and are confident it will deliver the results we are looking for."

query.title: Jake Bambridge
query.body:
“The key thing about Girardot is their ability to understand often complicated briefs and turn them into simple and effective creative ideas."

"An agency with a collaborative approach, good financial knowledge and sound judgement - my only reservation in recommending them is my reluctance to give the competition an edge!"

query.title: Simon Wilson
query.body:
“I have known Paul Girardot for over 15 years and Premier Asset Management started working with Girardot in 2012."

"There has been a clear plan for the advertising to get across very specific messages to our target audiences and to help us build our brand awareness. The business results, feedback and research tell us that the campaigns created by Girardot have been a great success.”
